name: Frosty Rampage
description:
CONTROLS
  • A,D or Left,Right - move left/right
  • W or Spacebar or Up - jump
  • Ctrl - slide
  • LMB or F - attack
STORY

A bunch of carnivorous snowmans have attecked your village! You are the last person alive (maybe guy on this hill is aslo alive but who knows). Show them who you are and kill them all as much as possible until you die (You will die)

GOOD LUCK

MY CHANNEL 👉👈

(Po Polsku - kliknij na obrazek ♥️)
